p_1: Frontline is an opening animation inspired by the Star Wars Battlefront series. Due to time constraints, I kept the animation in animatic pro, prioritizing cleaner lines and motions for colors and shading.
p_4: Each frame was drawn independenly in photoshop. First, rough sketch keyframes were produced before going back to add rough inbetweens. As a further pass, I did cleanup to draw cleaner outlines over the sketches. Frames were drawn as separate layers and played back using Photoshop's timeline panel. The background was also drawn as a separate layer, but animated during the composition stage.
p_7: Animations were broken down into and composed as shots. Each shot consisted of several frames stiched together with their backgrounds into a separate composition. Backgrounds could additionally be keyframed and animated when combined with foregrounds. The shots compositions could further be combined into a larger composition for the entire animatic.
